<h2>AgenciaSEO.eu</h2>.company_description:
The mission of this agency is to make the digital marketing strategy of its clients profitable.

At agenciaSEO.eu they strive to achieve the best results with tailored strategies in SEO, PPC, analytics, conversion and content marketing.

products.product_description: SEO positioning guarantees companies that their website is placed in the top positions of search engines such as Google, providing them with maximum quality visibility based on keywords related to their main project or mission.

<h2>Aunoa</h2>.company_description:
Aunoa is a company specialized in the development of software to automate and scale customer or citizen service services, in the case of AAPP.

This is possible, thanks to the design of Chatbots that use Artificial Intelligence and their daily training carried out by linguists, which guarantee optimal functioning and continuous improvement. Through Conversational AI, conversations and processes are automated, implementing solutions adapted to the needs of each business/service model and guaranteeing the optimization of resources.

products.product_name: Omnichannel customer service platform (Original name (Spanish): Plataforma ominicanal atención al cliente)
products.product_description:
Conversational AI solution designed for the automation of processes, such as customer service and management through natural language recognition, offering immediate, personalized and effective responses.

This tool is easily integrated into different conversational channels: Web, WhatsApp and social networks, allowing an omnichannel model to optimize the user experience.

  • Hotels.

  • Artificial intelligence

<h2>Bioscore</h2>.company_description:
Bioscore is a technology company located in Valencia that seeks to integrate sustainability in hotels and chains with the aim of providing value and competitiveness to the sector.

They have a certification system, which allows evaluating the level of sustainability of a hotel. The Bioscore icons position establishments based on a new criterion that conveys an accommodation's commitment to society and the environment. Likewise, they provide software as a tool to develop and manage the sustainability plan and efficiently report ESG (Environmental, Social and Government) information. In addition, they provide a sustainability rating to OTAs and TTOO. Its mission is to democratize sustainability.

products.product_name: Platform Digital Bioscore (Original name (Spanish): Plataforma Digital Bioscore)
products.product_description:
Its platform, 100% online, is a technological tool to develop and manage the sustainability plan and efficiently report ESG (Environmental, Social and Government) information.

It is a unique space that allows data to be collected, measured and shared. In addition, it allows for the preparation of sustainability reports and reports, essential documents for building CSR and communicating it to interest groups.
products.target_audience:
Target audience

  • Hotels
  • Restaurants
  • Tourist Destinations.
products.solType:
Solution type:

  • Software
  • Sustainability

Company specialized in Artificial Intelligence and Deep Learning.

We develop customized products to extract knowledge from the data of companies in the tourism sector, smart destinations and administrations.

products.product_description: Development of products based on artificial intelligence tailored to the needs of each client with the objective of extracting predictions and carrying out a comprehensive analysis that allows the development of actions to improve the performance of each business and minimize costs through technology

<h2>Dielmo 3D</h2>.company_description:
Dielmo 3D is one of the main providers of geographic information in Spain, a concept that began to be fundamental in the era of geo-information and new ICTs.

Since 2016, the company has been committed to developing a series of products and services related to 360º photography for the digitization of tourist resources in destinations and the digitization of company facilities. Providing differentiated image quality generated with the support of cartographic techniques, generating high-resolution panoramic views.

products.product_name: Digitization of resources and facilities (Virtual Visits/360º tours) (Original name (Spanish): Digitalización de recursos e instalaciones (Visitas Virtuales/ tours 360º))
products.product_description:
Virtual visits/360º tours, museumization, digitalized interactive routes, commercial digitalization campaigns and digitalized viewpoints are generated.

They are mainly oriented towards tourism, providing accessibility to tourist attractions. For its creation, Dielmo 3D has a department specializing in panoramic images, a team made up of graduates in Geomatic Engineering-Topography, a specialist in heritage virtualization and professionals in photography and graphic design.
products.target_audience:
Target audience

  • Tourist Destinations
  • Tourist Offices
  • Theme Parks
  • Hotels
  • Restaurants.
products.solType:
Solution type:

  • Virtual Environments
  • Accessibility

products.product_name: Digital Tourist Viewpoints (Original name (Spanish): Miradores Turísticos Digitales)
products.product_description:
It is an innovative technological tool and an outstanding digitization product that generates very high resolution Digital Tourist Viewpoints, combining cartographic techniques with photographic software for their creation.

These are projects for municipalities, regions and inter-municipal associations that allow you to enjoy the best visits to a place or area as if you were contemplating it with binoculars. In addition, it helps to obtain expanded information about the area being observed.

  • Hotels.
products.solType:
Solution type:

  • Virtual Environments
  • Accessibility

products.product_name: 360º Product Photography (Original name (Spanish): Fotografía de Producto 360º)
products.product_description:
360º product photographs are generated for catalogs/online stores, in the e-commerce world.

This is an ideal technique for displaying objects. It consists of taking successive images with a small variation in the position of the object. This allows users to view the object of study from multiple angles with simple navigation.

Target audience

  • Ecommerce
  • Museums.

  • Virtual Environments

<h2>Doblemente</h2>.company_description: Doble is a software company dedicated to offering innovative solutions for the sale and management of tourist reservations, focused on meeting the needs of incoming agencies and tour and transfer companies.

products.product_name: I have (Original name (Spanish): Dispongo)
products.product_description:
Dispongo is a tourism reservation sales and management software that provides clients with the option to charge their own FIT rates, perform XML integrations with bed banks and channel managers and manage the sale to the end customer + B2B.

In addition, this technological solution offers companies full control over the booking engine and allows them to issue vouchers and invoices automatically

<h2>Experticket</h2>.company_description:
Experticket is a Global System for the distribution of tickets and tourist services that facilitates total control over the distribution and sale of tickets, being a 100% flexible and customizable technological solution to adapt to the unique needs of each client.< /p>

Experticket allows companies to control their distribution, while carrying out a comprehensive analysis of billing and accounting information.

<h2>Glop Software TPV</h2>.company_description:
The Glop company has been developing IT solutions for the hospitality industry since 1997 with the aim of digitizing and automating the management of sales, purchases, stocks, employees and customers at the point of sale.

To achieve their goal, they have created four solutions adapted to the hospitality, retail, fashion and food sectors.

products.product_name: Gulp (Original name (Spanish): Glop)
products.product_description:
Glop is a management software for hospitality that unifies the management of sales, purchases, delivery, reservations, cooking, costs, employees and customers in a single tool.

This software has more than 13,000 licenses sold and is expandable through specific modules so that the entrepreneur pays only for what he needs: Taking orders, take away, kitchen order monitor, self-ordering kiosk, link with Glovo , Deliveroo, Just Eat, etc.

Insyde is a company founded in 2012 specialized in the development of products for the management and digitalization of destinations or tourist offices (DTI).

Currently, its products are present in more than 100 tourist destinations and organizations, among which Turisme Comunitat Valenciana, Prodetur, Cantur (Cantabria tourism), Benidorm, Gandía, Benicàssim, Visit Valencia, Comillas, Campello stand out. , Torrevieja, San Carles de la Rápita and Lloret de Mar.

products.product_name: Seeketing - Mobility and user behavior (Original name (Spanish): Seeketing - Movilidad y comportamiento de usuarios)
products.product_description:
The Seeketing solution allows measuring the flows of human traffic between different points of a locality, allowing to validate the effectiveness of the actions implemented by the municipality to redirect traffic to the planned areas.

Likewise, these metrics will help the planning of public investments (transportation, municipal facilities, etc. The project is based on the installation of SEEKETING NODES hardware at exterior or interior points covering the specified areas, according to the installation points where there is electricity and communications supply. This service also has a system for analyzing the information collected by the NODES, and a platform capable of collecting personal data provided by visitors who wish to do so, and sending messages by proximity to said users. visitors via SMS or E-Mail.

PaynoPain is a successful Spanish fintech that has been active since 2011 providing payment coverage on a global scale and currently has technological projects in more than 12 countries around the world.

Our mission is to make any financial management easy, agile and secure, and to achieve this we constantly seek simple and innovative solutions by putting the most advanced technology at the service of society.

products.product_description:
Online payment gateway.

Comprehensive and omnichannel payment gateway with an adaptable, secure and fast interface. It guarantees an agile and intuitive user experience so that the payment process is simple and fast from any device: computer, tablet or smartphone. From a small company to a multinational, PaynoPain has the appropriate structures to manage the payment services you need.

<h2>Pipeline Software</h2>.company_description:
Leading company in technological innovation for the tourism sector.

With a track record of more than 30 years of experience in creating software and web applications for Travel Agencies. Their knowledge of the tourism sector allows them to understand the needs of agencies and operators and create technological solutions that make it easier for them to launch their operations.

products.product_name: Orbis Travel Agency Management (Original name (Spanish): Orbis Gestión Agencia de Viajes)
products.product_description:
Orbis is a Commercial Management application for Travel Agencies that has more than 4,500 installations nationwide.

A solution that is easy to use, efficient, widely implemented and with excellent after-sales service that allows travel agencies absolute control of all individual and group files in process, manages the control of passengers and tickets and issues receipts, delivery notes and invoices automatically while maintaining exhaustive monitoring of collections and payments. The best option for the mechanization of your agency.

products.product_description:
Orbis Portal allows advanced B2B and B2C marketing of any type of tourism product, also integrating a charging system and advanced options such as its own widgets or distribution lists.

This platform presents high web usability and intuitive and fast navigation systems. In addition, it has an advanced statistics, analysis and segmentation system that allows you to get the most out of any action.

They improve the visitor experience with gamification, geolocation, augmented reality and smart data.

<h2>Safety Global</h2>.company_description:
Safety Global is a technology consultancy specialized in access control, ticketing and cashless capacity for leisure, culture and tourism.

This company has its own technology and an expert team that studies and analyzes the best solution for each event, adapting it to the needs of the entrepreneur and focusing on the creation of a unique experience for the user.

products.product_name: Y Beach
products.product_description:
Y Beach is a service that consists of the creation of a personalized website or App for booking appointments at beaches or swimming pools.

With Y Beach, destinations have an access control and capacity management system in these spaces, also having access to obtaining data and reports on how users behave.
products.target_audience:
Target audience

products.product_description: Personalized website that encompasses the entire leisure offer of a city, both private and public, integrated into a platform for ticket sales, capacity control and space reservation.

products.product_name: Tracking and Digital Antigen Test (Original name (Spanish): Rastreo y Digit. Test de Antígenos)
products.product_description:
Rastreocio is a customizable computer application based on QR technology that guarantees tracking and traceability for leisure and other establishments.

In addition, to guarantee the celebration of safe events and minimize the health risk due to contagion, a system has been created to perform “on-site” antigen testing for macro events.

<h2>Softme</h2>.company_description:
Softme is a custom software development company dedicated to creating desktop, web and mobile applications that provide a solution to any technological problem.

Also; Softme also has E-Commerce Consulting services, SEO and SEM positioning, digital marketing, web design and internal management training courses.

products.product_name: Booking Softme
products.product_description:
Booking Softme provides establishments with a tool to manage online sales with its own booking engine, without intermediaries or commissions.

This application integrates with Hestia, which allows discrimination by IP and time, and is developed in collaboration with real hoteliers.
products.target_audience:
Target audience

  • Tourist Apartments.

Solution type:

  • Booking engine

products.product_name: Planning Softme
products.product_description:
This tool offers establishments the possibility of managing reservations, as well as setting sales objectives and other KPIs.

Added to the previous functions are those of preparing work reports, establishing objectives and controlling notices.

Target audience

  • Hotels
  • Tourist Apartments.

Solution type:

  • Booking engine

products.product_name: API Open Data
products.product_description:
This API follows the Open Data philosophy, offering a tool to distribute the content you want to publish from a single platform.

An application that allows you to manage, edit and share texts, images and videos in a comfortable and simple way.

<h2>SWAT ID</h2>.company_description: SWAT ID is a company with extensive experience in the implementation and start-up of DTI projects at the level of sensorization and data acquisition, being a leading entity in IOT technology.

products.product_name: Tourist Traceability Sensor (Original name (Spanish): Sensor de Trazabilidad Turística)
products.product_description:
Sensors for detecting mobile devices using Wifi, Bluetooth and BLE interfaces.

With these sensors it is possible to know the resident and visitor tourist flow at the points of interest in a specific area, a technology that has applications such as capacity control or obtaining information to adapt the resources of those most visited points.

Leading Leisure Tour Operator in the Traveltech sector, with more than 10 years of experience in the distribution of leisure and associated tourist services, using the most advanced technology.

Tixalia offers the perfect combination between a wide catalog completely specialized in leisure products and the best technological solutions for their distribution.

<h2>unBlock the city</h2>.company_description:
The platform allows any space to communicate in a personalized and effective way with citizens.

As well as understanding the interaction, interests and behaviors of users for better decision making.

products.product_name: Smart QR on any medium and space (Original name (Spanish): QR inteligente en cualquier soporte y espacio)
products.product_description:
The unBlock app is capable of distinguishing who is scanning you and offering you content related to your interests.

That is, from the same QR, two people will obtain different information, depending on their tastes.
